Auction.description: Full auction details including pricing and winner information.

AuctionSummary.description: Slimmer auction representation for list views to reduce payload size.

AuctionUpsert.description: Attributes accepted when creating or updating an auction via admin endpoints.

Bid.description: A single bid placed against an auction.

BidHistoryItem.description: Bid history entry with bidder display name.

BidHistoryResponse.description: Envelope returned from bid history endpoints.

BidPack.description: Information about a purchasable bid pack.

BidPackUpsert.description: Attributes accepted when creating or updating bid packs via admin endpoints.

BidPlacementResponse.description: Response envelope returned after placing a bid.

CheckoutSession.description: Stripe checkout session details used to complete purchases.

clientSecret.description: Client secret used to render the Stripe checkout flow.

Error.description: Standard error envelope returned by all error responses. error_code maps to ServiceResult#code or controller error codes.

error_code.description: Symbol/string code derived from ServiceResult#code so clients can branch on error type.

UserSession.description: Session details and tokens returned after login/refresh.

bearer_jwt.description: A bearer token that will be supplied within an `Authorization` header as `bearer <token>`. In this case, the format of the token is specified as JWT.

info.description:
REST API for the XBid auction platform. Endpoints cover authentication,
auctions, bidding, bid packs, payments, maintenance mode, and admin tools.
info.summary: Interactive docs for the XBid backend
info.title: XBid API

get.description: Returns public auction summaries filtered by status.

GET /api/v1/admin/auctions
Returns auctions with optional status, date, and search filters for admin views.
get.summary: List auctions for admin with filters and pagination

get.description:
GET /api/v1/admin/auctions/:id
Retrieves full auction details for administrators.

post.description:
POST /api/v1/admin/audit
Records an audit log for administrative actions.

get.description:
GET /admin/bid_packs
Lists all bid packs including retired ones for administrative management.

post.description:
POST /admin/bid_packs
Create a bid pack with the provided attributes.

get.summary: Return a template bid pack for creation

delete.description:
DELETE /admin/bid_packs/:id
Retires a bid pack to prevent purchase while keeping history.
Retires an existing bid pack while preserving purchase history.

patch.description:
PATCH/PUT /admin/bid_packs/:id
Updates bid pack fields or status.

put.description:
PATCH/PUT /admin/bid_packs/:id
Updates bid pack fields or status.

get.summary: Fetch a bid pack for editing

get.description:
GET /api/v1/admin/maintenance
Returns the maintenance toggle state for administrators.

post.summary: Toggle maintenance mode on or off

get.description:
GET /api/v1/admin/payments
Lists purchases with optional fuzzy email search for admins.
get.summary: List payments with optional email search

post.description:
POST /api/v1/admin/payments/:id/refund
Issues a refund for a payment and records the refund ID from the gateway.
post.summary: Issue a refund for a payment

get.description:
GET /api/v1/admin/users
Returns the list of administrative users.

post.summary: Grant admin role to a user
Grant superadmin role to a user
Revoke admin role from a user
Revoke superadmin role from a user

get.description: Returns public auction summaries filtered by status.

post.description: Create and schedule or activate an auction. Status values are normalized to the allowed list.

get.description:
GET /api/v1/auctions/:auction_id/bid_history
Returns the current bid list for an auction along with the winning user, if present.
get.summary: List bids for a given auction (newest first)

post.description: Places a bid for the current user on the specified auction.
post.summary: Place a bid on an auction

delete.description: Retire an auction to prevent further bids while keeping history intact.

get.description: Fetches the auction and embeds the current bid list.
get.summary: Retrieve a single auction with bids

patch.description: Update auction details or transition status for an existing auction.

put.description: Update auction details or transition status for an existing auction.

post.description: Extends an active auction within the configured extension window.
post.summary: Extend an auction's end time (admin only)

get.description: Publicly lists active bid packs available for purchase.
Fetches the status of a Stripe checkout session using its ID.
get.summary: Check the Stripe checkout session status

get.description: Idempotently processes a paid checkout session and credits the user with purchased bids.
get.summary: Handle successful checkout callbacks and credit the user

post.description: Initializes a Stripe checkout session for the given bid pack and returns the client secret.
post.summary: Start a Stripe Checkout session for a bid pack

get.description:
GET /api/v1/logged_in
Returns session and user context if the token is valid.
get.summary: Check whether the provided token is valid

post.description:
POST /api/v1/login
Authenticates a user and returns session tokens plus user context.
post.summary: Log in and create a session

delete.description:
DELETE /api/v1/logout
Revokes the active session token and returns a confirmation message.
delete.summary: Log out and revoke the current session token

get.description:
GET /api/v1/maintenance
Returns whether maintenance mode is enabled for end users.

post.summary: Reset a password using a token

post.description: Exchanges a valid refresh token for a new session token pair.
post.summary: Refresh the current session using a refresh token

get.description: Provides session token metadata for the authenticated user.
get.summary: Return remaining time for the current session token
